product_name: DERMA EVitamin C Bright Eyes Hydro Gel Patches
summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsCruelty FreeVeganSustainable PackagingGive BackDerma E's Vitamin C Bright Eyes Hydro Gel Patches Brighten, hydrate, and improve the appearance of the under-eye area by intensely moisturizing with antioxidants and phytonutrients.
details: DetailsBenefitsInstantly transform puffy-looking eyes into well-rested, wide-awake eyes with these cooling eye gel patchesEnriched with moisture-boosting antioxidants and phytonutrients that leave skin feeling soothed and refreshedFeaturesRecyclable & wind energy certifiedFormulated without GMOs, gluten, or soyKey IngredientsAllantoin: Increases skin smoothness and moisture absorption, helping to reduce the appearance of wrinklesCaffeine: A strong antioxidant that reduces the appearance of puffiness while tightening and brightening skinVitamins C & B3: Contain anti-aging properties that target fine lines, wrinkles and dullness while helping to brighten the under-eye areaItem 2556743How To UsePlace gel patch onto clean, dry under eye area for 10 minutes (or longer if desired) in the morning, evening or when needed. Discard after use and pat remaining serum into skin. For external use only.IngredientsWater (Aqua), Glycerin, Niacinamide, Carrageenan, Ethyl Ascorbyl Ether (Vitamin C), Allantoin, Cucumis Sativus (Cucumber) Fruit Extract, Caffeine, Sodium Hyaluronate, Aloe Barbadensis (Aloe Vera) Leaf Juice, Arginine, Ricinus Communis (Castor) Seed Oil, Ceratonia Siliqua (Carob) Gum, Cyamopsis Tetragonoloba (Guar) Gum, Glucomannan, Cellulose Gum, Calcium Lactate, Calcium Chloride, Potassium Chloride, Mica, Hydroxyacetophenone, Chlorphenesin, CI 77891, CI 77491, 1,2-Hexanediol, Polysorbate 80, Sucrose.
how_to_use: Place gel patch onto clean, dry under eye area for 10 minutes (or longer if desired) in the morning, evening or when needed. Discard after use and pat remaining serum into skin. For external use only.

reviews.headline: My New Go-To Eye Patches! 10/10
reviews.comments: I had bought the 60ct eye patches and it lasted me about a month (4 weeks 2 days). I used them every day and honestly, they made such a difference. My dark circles and puffiness went away, and my under eyes look so much smoother and brighter now. I'll be buying again.

reviews.headline: Drippy and rips
reviews.comments: I was excited to try these patches however, there's way too much product where you can barely keep a hold of them and the product feels kind of slimy. Trying to play some on they will easily rip. I do have nails, but they are not sharp and they never cut any other patches I've used. Now I just feel like I'm trying to finish it out of principal, but I really don't think they're doing anything. Would not recommend or purchase Again

reviews.headline: Product description is wrong
reviews.comments: I thought these were a good deal and was excited to try them. The item description says 10 count. There is only 5 in the box. Mine was also packaged poorly for shipping and came damaged. Will be returning for something different.

reviews.headline: Waste of Money
reviews.comments: Packaging is awful and impossibke to get the actual eye patch patch out. They are plastic/silicone which makes them floppy. There's absolutely no product on these. Dry as bone. Hands down the worst eye patches i have ever bought.

reviews.headline: Not a chance I'd buy again
reviews.comments: So, I really do like Derma E products and have used them for several yrs, but these eye patches are NOT worth it and do not work.   I was so disappointed to find zero serum on them and that they did nothing to depuff or brighten.  You live and learn but this is a pricey mistake I won't make again.

reviews.headline: Terrible & useless
reviews.comments: These are slimy & tear apart when trying to get them out of the jar with the tiny spatula that is included. The shape of these pads are weird, they are not cut to fit under your eye and they have an artificial gold sparkly residue in the gel that is left behind which I'm guessing is supposed to be the "glow" this is allegedly supposed to produce after applications. Waste of money and do not recommend anyone buy this product. I'd give zero stars if possible.

reviews.headline: Don't recommend
reviews.comments: I'm pretty unparticular about eye patches and will usually buy whatever is on sale for the moment. I use them daily before work (no makeup) and as skincare prep before makeup. These were terrible! They're so thin and impossible to get out of the jar without tearing, and then they leave a terrible residue on your face. I didnt notice the residue as much when I wore them before work (just peeled them off and go), but when I put other skin care or makeup, they pill so bad and make my face look like it was peeling. Won't repurchase.

reviews.headline: Theses are ok
reviews.comments: Was cooling and helped brighten some. Difficult to get out of jar. Have had to throw away some due to ripping, tearing, and not sticking. They seem thin compare to other under eye patches I have used

reviews.headline: Theses are ok
reviews.comments: Was cooling and helped brighten some. Difficult to get out of jar. Have had to throw away some due to ripping, tearing, and not sticking. They seem thin compare to other under eye patches I have used

reviews.headline: So soothing and cooling! Great product!
reviews.comments: These gel patches are the bomb! They are listed at an affordable price for the product you get and make your eye area feel very soothed, cooled, and overall amazing. The patches also have a great amount of serum and are easy to apply and keep on. After each use, I see an instant brightening and de-puffing effect. I highly recommend!

reviews.headline: Phenomenal
reviews.comments: I've never used a product that has worked as fast and as well as these eye hydrogels do. These brighten, soothe, depuff, and hydrate my underyes all at the same time. I put them on in the morning, make my coffee and breakfast, and maybe do a few chores (I took down curtains yesterday morning while wearing them and they stayed on fine). I also have very sensitive eyes and cant use a lot of moisturizer and eye creams but these dont bother me at all.

reviews.headline: Phenomenal
reviews.comments: I've never used a product that has worked as fast and as well as these eye hydrogels do. These brighten, soothe, depuff, and hydrate my underyes all at the same time. I put them on in the morning, make my coffee and breakfast, and maybe do a few chores (I took down curtains yesterday morning while wearing them and they stayed on fine). I also have very sensitive eyes and cant use a lot of moisturizer and eye creams but these dont bother me at all.

reviews.headline: I'm so disappointed
reviews.comments: I've tried a lot of different eye patches/ eye masks. I was really excited to try these out, and I had them on my Wishlist for years before I finally tried them. I really dislike them. They're the worst, which sucks because they feel really good when you put them on. But they rip crazy easily, it's hard to even get them out of the jar in one piece.  I do think they have a lot of Serum on them, but unlike other eye patches I've used where the Serum absorbs into my skin after use, these leave a clumpy, sticky residue that makes my eyes water if I rub them accidentally. And my skin does not feel good or hydrated or rejuvenated when I take them off. Where the eye patches rest on my cheeks causes me to have pretty severe acne flare ups. Other eye patches I've tried that were shaped the same never made my skin break out. I really wanted to love these, but they just did not work out for me. I do not recommend.

reviews.headline: First time trying under eyes patches!
reviews.comments: Grabbed these for my sweet mom for her stocking… she has not stopped raving about them! Both of us have tried so many dermatologist recommend products for various things… she has not stopped talking about the instant results from derma e's patches :,)

reviews.headline: Just purchases for the 2nd time. I will buy again and again!
reviews.comments: This brand was 50% off so I thought, why not? The first time I used them I felt a bit clumsy. Once I figured out how to apply, I was hooked! I pat them into place and leave them on for hours, I've even slept in them! LOVE!

reviews.headline: They're the best I've ever used!
reviews.comments: Truly mean it when i say that theyre amazing! I always can tell a difference when i use them. They depuff and help instantly brighten. I recommened to everyone and repurchase everytime.

reviews.headline: Unfortunately not a fan
reviews.comments: I bought these after seeing a recommendation on YouTube (Tati maybe?). But unfortunately I'm not a fan. They're a little too sticky/goopy for me. In truth, I haven't used a lot of eye patches though, so maybe that's just how they are?

reviews.headline: ACTUALLY WORKED
reviews.comments: I absolutely love these under-eye patches! I've tried other brands and even a gel, but nothing worked as well as this. I was searching for something to reduce puffiness—especially after late nights and crying—and this product truly delivers. It's like magic! Just a note: if left on for too long, it can leave a slight residue, but it's easy to remove.

reviews.headline: Amazing
reviews.comments: Safe for sensitive skin and skin looks much better after use

reviews.headline: No complaints
reviews.comments: Lots of complaints in other reviews and im here to tell you they're wrong. The spatula isnt included for just decoration, its to easily grab the thin eye pads lol have used twice and they dont rip. Sure theyll slide down a *tad* but hardly enough for me to not repurchase. Feels very cooling and refreshing. Definitely have sensitive skin and have had no issues. Putting these in the fridge would feel amazinggg.

faceoff_positive.comments:
I've only ever bought eye patches that come in a single package. And I've gotta say, that when I opened up this container and saw that there are SO MANY inside, I was mind blown! What an incredibly easy way to stay true to your green ethics by cutting down on such a large amount of waste that occurs when these things are sold in individual packs! 
As always, I'm OBSESSED with the fact that DermaE cuts out all of the nasty chemicals that are found in sooooo many beauty products these days. As an expecting mother, I'm especially conscious of what is being absorbed into my skin, and I love being able to still give myself a little TLC without being paranoid about what my sweet babe will be absorbing into their growing body!
I inherited the darkest eye circles you've ever seen from my dad...and they're the bane of my existence. I was hoping for an actual miracle in making the darkness disappear and didn't necessarily see that...BUT, my under eye area was DEFINITELY brighter than before using them, AND I'm really hoping that over time and continued use, I'll continue to see improvements there. 
Just as a heads up, when I applied the first patch from the top of the giant mountain of them, there was quite a lot of product on them....(which, you obviously want!) But there was so much that the patch started slip sliding down my cheek. haha. I wiped some of it off and reapplied it and it worked like a charm after that. 
I was provided with product in return for my honest, unbiased feedback.
faceoff_positive.headline: WELL worth the price for how many eye patches are in there!

faceoff_negative.comments:
Pros:

This product for me is more for a fun experiential 15 minute eye patch that's really nice to have on.
Layers well with oil-- I used the Biossance squalene oil.
Provides Instant hydration and depuffing.

Cons: 

Since this was a vitamin c product, I opted to top it off with my Perricone MD Vit C ester suncreen. While the product is good for hydrating and depuffing, I noticed that it did not sit well with the spf. Little white pieces started peeling off after both products came in contact even though I waited for the eye gel patches to dry off.  I've layered The Ordinary serums with my sunscreen in the past and this issue has never happened before. So be careful with layering the eye gel patches with other products especially if you're planning to use make up on that day.
faceoff_negative.headline: It's not as great as the reviews hype it up
